backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a requirement to add and reference a specific static meme image.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of key frontend files and their Valentine-themed functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens with dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/valentine.html: Standalone Valentine interaction page with evasive No button, Yes celebration, custom CSS, and love-letter content.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React Valentine UI with moving No button logic and celebration view showing the static meme image and letter.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Full Internet Identity context provider and hooks for login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles with alternate OKLCH palette and Inter font setup for the main React app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point mounting App with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query setup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for extended theming.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, feature requests, and assets for building an interactive romantic Valentine proposal page.
